snippet: Foster Farms, a California chicken producer, has issued a recall for 170 different chicken products after being linked to an outbreak of an antibiotic-resistant strain of salmonella.
abstract: Foster Farms has issued recall for 170 different chicken products after being linked to outbreak of antibiotic-resistant strain of salmonella.
lead_paragraph: Foster Farms, a California chicken producer, has issued a recall for 170 different chicken products after being linked to an outbreak of an antibiotic-resistant strain of salmonella.

headline.main: Briefing: Foster Farms Recalls Chicken Linked to Salmonella
headline.print_headline: Foster Farms Recalls Chicken Linked to Salmonella
